thread.title: Loved it, would definitely stay there again
thread.title_full: Loved it, would definitely stay there again - Review of Double Happiness Beijing Courtyard Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Awasha37
title: Loved it, would definitely stay there again
text: Very friendly and helpful staff, comfortable rooms with great facilities, it was warm despite the fact it's a courtyard and was snowing. loved the traditional Chinese environment.. would definitely stay there again if I visit Beijing again
